onUse.condition: c.Robot is not null && c.Robot.Armor < c.Robot.ArmorMax

Blue Potion.name: Blue Potion
Blue Potion.description: Possibly awakes the people of Thalos.

City of Guardians Location.name: City of Guardians Location
City of Guardians Location.description: Coordinates to the City of the Guardians.

Cloak Model Reference.name: Cloak Model Reference
Cloak Model Reference.description: The model of a Cloak of Invisibility being tested at the Dinosaur Preserve.

Cloak of Invisibility.name: Cloak of Invisibility
Cloak of Invisibility.description: Makes you invisible to everyone for a short while.

Karossean Book Reference.name: Karossean Book Reference
Karossean Book Reference.description: '..the ancient Karosseans would settle a tribal dispute by choosing champions..'.

Karossean Countersign.name: Karossean Countersign
Karossean Countersign.description: The countersign karosseans use amongst officers.

Karossean Password.name: Karossean Password
Karossean Password.description: The password karosseans use amongst officers.

Karossean Uniform.name: Karossean Uniform
Karossean Uniform.description: The standard karossean uniform used by soldiers.

Lavender Potion.name: Lavender Potion
Lavender Potion.description: Possibly awakes the people of Thalos.

Luck Amulet.name: Luck Amulet
Luck Amulet.description: A scientifically proven good-luck charm. Your luck is increased by 1 while you have it.

onUse.effect: c.Robot.Abilities.Add(new ActiveAbility { Name = "Seeker Missile", Description = "Charges: 1. Use: deal 10 damage to enemy unit.", Icon = "", Usages = 1, Effects = new() { [BattlePhase.BeforeRoll] = "c.Other.Armor -= 10" } }

Seeker Missile.name: Seeker Missile
Seeker Missile.description: Use: attach to your robot to give it 'Seeker Missile' ability. 1 charge. Use: deal 10 damage to target enemy unit.
